articles.content:
Mongolians Here 
   Pyongyang, February 12 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the Mongolian Mt. Paektu Association for Independent Development headed by L. Tserensodnom and D. Michka, general director of the Mongolian HUM Company Ltd., and his party arrived here on Tuesday on the occasion of the birthday of Kim Jong Il.
